08107dfa-170a-481a-9e4a-4e6e248cb724.plaintext: We welcome a wide range of talks, so feel free to submit your abstracts and come tell your story to the audience!

children.text: We welcome a wide range of talks, so feel free to submit your abstracts and come tell your story to the audience!

37ec96b9-1efd-425f-90a3-48c96940cefd.plaintext: Plone is a modern content management system, known especially for its security, usability and flexibility. Built on Python and React. 100% open source and free.

children.text: Plone is a modern content management system, known especially for its security, usability and flexibility. Built on Python and React. 100% open source and free.

3d3a72e3-6a4b-42a1-ab88-f81f6519c656.plaintext: All necessary information can easily be found on the conference website, along with contact information for the organizers: https://2025.ploneconf.org/ .

428a7322-bc58-49cc-af33-5674bf5a0e0e.plaintext: You are warmly welcome to the Plone Conference 2025!

children.text: You are warmly welcome to the Plone Conference 2025!

5c18f4a6-a6b3-4617-8612-1fa42044bad5.plaintext: You can either get tickets for the whole conference week or just for PyCon Finland: https://2025.ploneconf.org/tickets

75d6e5ff-7ecd-400a-a02e-9b36def53180.plaintext: Plone Conference 2025 is the 23rd occasion of the event and it will be held on October 13-19, 2025 in Jyväskylä, Finland. It is hosted by the University of Jyväskylä in collaboration with the Plone Foundation .

children.text: Plone Conference 2025 is the 23rd occasion of the event and it will be held on October 13-19, 2025 in Jyväskylä, Finland. It is hosted by the University

875b8dc2-7686-49c6-b9f9-dad2b688ad4e.plaintext: Expecting 150+ international professionals plus more from Finland, the conference will be a perfect opportunity to learn, connect and collaborate with new and very experienced developers.

children.text: Expecting 150+ international professionals plus more from Finland, the conference will be a perfect opportunity to learn, connect and collaborate with new and very experienced developers.

b027fd45-c093-45f7-ab2d-04fee7eb4797.plaintext: Call for papers is now open, check instructions at: https://2025.ploneconf.org/call-for-papers

be59c2ac-3e6a-4a11-b745-ab957cbb360a.plaintext: Early bird (or snake, if you will) ticket sales with discount prices starts on Apr 1, 2025.

children.text: Early bird (or snake, if you will) ticket sales with discount prices starts on Apr 1, 2025.

c05b8c94-559b-4cad-8c95-420c25152208.plaintext: This year the conference will include a special one day event, PyCon Finland on Friday 17 October, 2025. During the day, the talk selection and the keynote will be specially focusing more on Python.

d69d6347-f3c9-4f57-a5e1-ea960fc375cd.plaintext: Plone Conference, the annual gathering of the friendly and enthusiastic Plone community, has been a cornerstone of the open-source CMS world for over two decades.

children.text: Plone Conference, the annual gathering of the friendly and enthusiastic Plone community, has been a cornerstone of the open-source CMS world for over two decades.
